markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Fetch Behemoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2208)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A fetch behemoth is much larger than a stalker, and forms from the soul of a Large [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) or [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91).

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 45

**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 45

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 20">[Fetch Behemoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2208)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 613</row>

**Perception** +36; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +36, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +39, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +39, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +39, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +32, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +36

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +6

**Con** +9

**Int** +2

**Wis** +8

**Cha** +8
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 44 

**Fort** +37 

**Ref** +32 

**Will** +34 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

**HP** 460

, regeneration 45 (deactivated by [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) or negative)

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 20, negative 20

**[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +38 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d6+18 bludgeoning plus 4d6 mental

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +38 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 4d4+18 bludgeoning

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 42
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to or from the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) only)
- **8th**
[Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95)
- **9th**
[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77)
- **10th**
[Cataclysm](/Spells.aspx?ID=32)
- **Constant (9th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-322" />
name: Fetch Behemoth
